flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: The bloom on topnof its head opensnand closes as theftemperature fluc­ntuates up andndown.
It spreads itsnpetals to absorbnsunlight. It alsoffloats in the airnto get closer tonthe sun.
As soon as itnrains, it closesnits flower andfhides in the shadenof a tree to avoidngetting wet.
SKIPLOOM’s flower blossoms when thentemperature rises above 64 degrees F.nHow much the flower opens depends onfthe temperature. For that reason, thisnPOKéMON is sometimes used as anthermometer.
SKIPLOOM’s flower blossoms when thentemperature rises above 64 degrees F.nHow much the flower opens depends onfthe temperature. For that reason, thisnPOKéMON is sometimes used as anthermometer.
It blossoms when the temperature risesnabove 64 degrees F. Because its flower’snblooming changes with the temperature,nit is sometimes used as a thermometer.
It spreads its petals to absorb sunlight.nIt also floats in the air to get closer tonthe sun.
The bloom on top of its head opens andncloses as the temperature fluctuates upnand down.
It blooms when the weather warms.nIt floats in the sky to soak up asnmuch sunlight as possible.
It blooms when the weather warms.nIt floats in the sky to soak up asnmuch sunlight as possible.
It blooms when the weather warms.nIt floats in the sky to soak up asnmuch sunlight as possible.
The bloom on top of its head opensnand closes as the temperaturenfluctuates up and down.
It spreads its petals to absorbnsunlight. It also floats in the airnto get closer to the sun.
Il fleurit lorsque les températuresnremontent. Il flotte dans le ciel npour absorber les rayons du soleil.
It blooms when the weather warms.nIt floats in the sky to soak up asnmuch sunlight as possible.

It blooms when the weather warms.nIt floats in the sky to soak up asnmuch sunlight as possible.
あたまのうえに　さいた　ハナはnきおんに　よって　ひらいたりnとじたりする　せいしつを　もつ。
머리 위에 핀 꽃은n기온에 따라 펴지거나n오므라드는 성질을 가졌다.
Le bourgeon sur sa tête s’ouvre et se ferme ennfonction des fluctuations de la température ambiante.
Temperaturschwankungen veranlassen es, die Blütenauf seinem Kopf immer zu öffnen oder zu schließen.
La flor de su cabeza se abre y cierra según suba onbaje la temperatura.
Il fiore sul capo si apre e si chiude con il continuonmutare della temperatura corporea.
The bloom on top of its head opens and closesnas the temperature fluctuates up and down.
頭の上に　咲いた　花はn気温に　よって　開いたりn閉じたりする　性質を　持つ。
たいようの　ひかりを　あびるためnはなびらを　ひろげるだけでなくnちかづこうと　そらにうかんでしまう。
태양의 빛을 잘 받기 위해n꽃잎을 펼칠 뿐만 아니라n가까이 가려고 하늘로 떠올라버린다.
Il étend ses pétales pour absorber la lumière du soleil.nIl flotte pour se rapprocher du soleil.
Es öffnet seine Blüte, um Sonnenlicht aufzunehmen.nEs schwebt in der Luft, um der Sonne näher zu sein.
Abre sus pétalos para absorber la luz solar. Tambiénnflota en el aire para estar más cerca del sol.
Spalanca i petali per assorbire la luce solare.nFluttua nell’aria per essere più vicino al sole.
It spreads its petals to absorb sunlight. It also floatsnin the air to get closer to the sun.
太陽の　光を　浴びるためn花びらを　広げるだけでなくn近づこうと　空に　浮かんでしまう。
きおんが　１８どを　こえると　はなが　ひらく。nおんどに　より　はなの　ひらきかたが　かわるのでnおんどけいの　かわりに　することも　ある。
기온이 18도를 넘으면 꽃이 핀다.n온도에 따라 꽃이 피는 모습이 바뀌어서n온도계 대신 쓰기도 한다.
La fleur de Floravol éclot lorsque la température atteint 18 °C.nL’ouverture de la fleur change en fonction de la température.nCertaines personnes se servent de ce Pokémon comme d’unnthermomètre.

Hubelupfs Blume beginnt zu blühen, wenn die Temperaturnüber 18 °C steigt. Wie weit sich die Blüte öffnet, hängt vonnder Höhe der Temperatur ab. Daher wird dieses Pokémonnmanchmal als Thermometer eingesetzt.
Skiploom florece cuando la temperatura llega a 18 °C.nLa apertura de los pétalos varía según la temperatura quenhaga. Por este motivo, la gente lo usa a veces a modo dentermómetro.
Il fiore di Skiploom sboccia quando la temperatura salenoltre i 18 °C. L’apertura del fiore dipende dalla temperatura.nPer questo motivo il Pokémon è usato anche comentermometro.

Skiploom’s flower blossoms when the temperature risesnabove 64 degrees Fahrenheit. How much the flower opensndepends on the temperature. For that reason, this Pokémonnis sometimes used as a thermometer.
気温が　１８度を　超えると　花が　開く。n温度に　より　花の　開きかたが　変わるのでn温度計の　代りに　することも　ある。
きおんが　１８どを　こえると　はなが　ひらく。nおんどに　より　はなの　ひらきかたが　かわるのでnおんどけいの　かわりに　することも　ある。
기온이 18도를 넘으면 꽃이 핀다.n온도에 따라 꽃이 피는 모습이 바뀌어서n온도계 대신 쓰기도 한다.
La fleur de Floravol éclot lorsque la température atteint 18 °C.nL’ouverture de la fleur change en fonction de la température.nCertaines personnes se servent de ce Pokémon comme d’unnthermomètre.
Hubelupfs Blume beginnt zu blühen, wenn die Temperaturnüber 18 °C steigt. Wie weit sich die Blume öffnet, hängt vonnder Temperatur ab. Daher wird dieses Pokémon manchmalnals Thermometer eingesetzt.
Skiploom florece cuando la temperatura llega a 18 °C.nLa apertura de los pétalos varía según la temperatura quenhaga. Por este motivo, la gente lo usa a veces a modo dentermómetro.
Il fiore di Skiploom sboccia quando la temperatura salenoltre i 18 °C. L’apertura del fiore dipende dalla temperatura.nPer questo motivo il Pokémon è usato anche comentermometro.

Skiploom’s flower blossoms when the temperature risesnabove 64 degrees Fahrenheit. How much the flower opensndepends on the temperature. For that reason, this Pokémonnis sometimes used as a thermometer.
気温が　１８度を　超えると　花が　開く。n温度に　より　花の　開きかたが　変わるのでn温度計の　代りに　することも　ある。
Die Blüte auf seinem Kopf verströmt einen leichtnbitteren Geruch, der eine entspannende Wirkungnhaben soll.
Wie weit sich Hubelupfs Blume öffnet, hängt vonnder Temperatur ab. Daher wurde es früher auchnals Thermometer eingesetzt.
